name: I Think I'm Fine
description:
Art 107 - Section 01 -- (SPRING 2022) Team Good for Health Bad for Education  - Final Virtual World

--THE TEAM--- 

Diana Tran - Lead Unity Developer 

Diana Tran - Lead Designer 

Diana Tran - Project Producer 

Diana Tran - Lead Interactive Designer

---STORY--- 

Welcome to the Circus! Where this is the happiest place on earth. Come today to experience a fun time popping pills and bottles, it's not a good time till you see all distorted reality! Come on down to experience the reality of drug abuse as an illusion for happiness. Tickets are free.... in exchange for your mental health! 

---NOTES---

CONTROLS: W, A, S, D - Move around 

MOUSE - Look around 

SHIFT - Sprint 

CTRL - Crouch 

SPACEBAR - Jump *** (to exit application, press ESC key). ***
